Class BaseButtonListener

java.lang.Object
BaseButtonListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, EventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
BookButtonListener, CreateButtonListener, ExitButtonListener, ManageButtonListener, OrderFoodButtonListener, ViewButtonListener
public abstract class BaseButtonListener extends Object implements ActionListener
Abstract base class for button listeners that handles common functionality.

  • Method Details

    • selectHotel

      public Hotel selectHotel(ArrayList<Hotel> hotels, HotelView view, String title, String message)
      Prompts the user to select a hotel from a list.
      Parameters:
      hotels - The list of hotels.
      view - The HotelView instance.
      title - The title of the selection dialog.
      message - The message displayed in the selection dialog.
      Returns:
      The selected Hotel instance or null if no hotel is selected.

    • getIntInput

      public int getIntInput(String message, int min, int max)
      Prompts the user to enter an integer within a specified range.
      Parameters:
      message - The message displayed in the input dialog.
      min - The minimum value of the input.
      max - The maximum value of the input.
      Returns:
      The entered integer within the specified range.

    • getCharInput

      Prompts the user to enter a single character.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The entered character.

      Parameters:
      message - The message displayed in the input dialog.
      min - The minimum value of the input.
      max - The maximum value of the input.
      Returns:
